00052 static void
00053 signal_handler_PropertyModified (DBusGProxy *proxy, gint type, GPtrArray *properties)
00054 {
00055     GValueArray *array = NULL;
00056     guint i;
00057     const gchar *udi;
00058     const gchar *key;
00059     gboolean added;
00060     gboolean removed;
00061 
00062     /* assertion checks */
00063     g_assert (proxy);
00064     g_assert (properties);
00065 
00066     if (!function.device_property_modified) {
00067         g_warning ("glibhal: signal_handler_PropertyModified when no function!");
00068         return;
00069     }
00070 
00071     udi = dbus_g_proxy_get_path (proxy);
00072     g_debug ("glibhal: property modified '%s'", udi);
00073     for (i = 0; i < properties->len; i++) {
00074         array = g_ptr_array_index (properties, i);
00075         if (array->n_values != 3) {
00076             g_warning ("array->n_values invalid (!3)");
00077             return;
00078         }
00079         key = g_value_get_string (g_value_array_get_nth (array, 0));
00080         removed = g_value_get_boolean (g_value_array_get_nth (array, 1));
00081         added = g_value_get_boolean (g_value_array_get_nth (array, 2));
00082         function.device_property_modified (udi, key, removed, added);
00083     }
00084 }

00091 static void
00092 signal_handler_DeviceRemoved (DBusGProxy *proxy, gchar *udi)
00093 {
00094     /* assertion checks */
00095     g_assert (proxy);
00096     g_assert (udi);
00097 
00098     if (!function.device_removed) {
00099         g_warning ("glibhal: signal_handler_DeviceRemoved when no function!");
00100         return;
00101     }
00102     g_debug ("glibhal: device removed '%s'", udi);
00103     function.device_removed (udi);
00104 }

00113 signal_handler_NewCapability (DBusGProxy *proxy, gchar *udi, gchar *capability)

00134 static void
00135 signal_handler_Condition (DBusGProxy *proxy, gchar *name, gchar *details)
00136 {
00137     /* assertion checks */
00138     g_assert (proxy);
00139     g_assert (name);
00140     g_assert (details);
00141 
00142     const gchar *udi;
00143     if (!function.device_condition) {
00144         g_warning ("glibhal: signal_handler_Condition when no function!");
00145         return;
00146     }
00147     udi = dbus_g_proxy_get_path (proxy);
00148     g_debug ("glibhal: condition '%s'", udi);
00149     function.device_condition (udi, name, details);
00150 }

00156 static gboolean
00157 glibhal_watch_add_device_removed (void)
00158 {
00159     DBusGConnection *system_connection;
00160     GError *error = NULL;
00161 
00162     /* assertion checks */
00163     g_assert (!function.device_removed);
00164     g_assert (!reg.device_removed);
00165 
00166     g_debug ("glibhal: DeviceRemoved: Registered");
00167     reg.device_removed = TRUE;
00168     if (!dbus_get_system_connection (&system_connection))
00169         return FALSE;
00170 
00171     proxy.device_removed = dbus_g_proxy_new_for_name_owner (system_connection,
00172         "org.freedesktop.Hal",
00173         "/org/freedesktop/Hal/Manager",
00174         "org.freedesktop.Hal.Manager", &error);
00175     dbus_g_proxy_add_signal (proxy.device_removed, "DeviceRemoved",
00176         G_TYPE_STRING, G_TYPE_INVALID);
00177     dbus_g_proxy_connect_signal (proxy.device_removed, "DeviceRemoved",
00178         G_CALLBACK (signal_handler_DeviceRemoved), NULL, NULL);
00179     return TRUE;
00180 }

00186 static gboolean
00187 glibhal_watch_add_device_new_capability (void)
00188 {
00189     DBusGConnection *system_connection;
00190     GError *error = NULL;
00191 
00192     /* assertion checks */
00193     g_assert (!function.device_new_capability);
00194     g_assert (!reg.device_new_capability);
00195 
00196     g_debug ("glibhal: NewCapability: Registered");
00197     reg.device_new_capability = TRUE;
00198     if (!dbus_get_system_connection (&system_connection))
00199         return FALSE;
00200     proxy.device_new_capability = dbus_g_proxy_new_for_name_owner (system_connection,
00201         "org.freedesktop.Hal",
00202         "/org/freedesktop/Hal/Manager",
00203         "org.freedesktop.Hal.Manager", &error);
00204 
00205     dbus_g_object_register_marshaller (gpm_marshal_VOID__STRING_STRING,
00206         G_TYPE_NONE, G_TYPE_STRING, G_TYPE_STRING, G_TYPE_INVALID);
00207     dbus_g_proxy_add_signal (proxy.device_new_capability, "NewCapability",
00208         G_TYPE_STRING, G_TYPE_STRING, G_TYPE_INVALID);
00209     dbus_g_proxy_connect_signal (proxy.device_new_capability, "NewCapability",
00210         G_CALLBACK (signal_handler_NewCapability), NULL, NULL);
00211     return TRUE;
00212 }

00219 gboolean
00220 glibhal_watch_add_device_condition (const gchar *udi)
00221 {
00222     DBusGConnection *system_connection;
00223     DBusGProxy *hal_proxy = NULL;
00224     GError *error = NULL;
00225     int a;
00226     UdiProxy *udiproxy;
00227 
00228     /* assertion checks */
00229     g_assert (udi);
00230 
00231     /* need to check for previous add */
00232     for (a=0;a < proxy.device_condition->len;a++) {
00233         udiproxy = g_ptr_array_index (proxy.device_condition, a);
00234         if (strcmp (udi, udiproxy->udi) == 0) {
00235             g_warning ("glibhal: Condition: Already registered UDI '%s'!", udi);
00236             return FALSE;
00237         }
00238     }
00239 
00240     g_debug ("glibhal: Condition: Registered UDI '%s'", udi);
00241     reg.device_condition = TRUE;
00242     if (!dbus_get_system_connection (&system_connection))
00243         return FALSE;
00244     hal_proxy = dbus_g_proxy_new_for_name_owner  (system_connection,
00245         "org.freedesktop.Hal",
00246         udi,
00247         "org.freedesktop.Hal.Device", &error);
00248 
00249     dbus_g_object_register_marshaller (gpm_marshal_VOID__STRING_STRING,
00250         G_TYPE_NONE, G_TYPE_STRING, G_TYPE_STRING, G_TYPE_INVALID);
00251     dbus_g_proxy_add_signal (hal_proxy, "Condition",
00252         G_TYPE_STRING, G_TYPE_STRING, G_TYPE_INVALID);
00253     dbus_g_proxy_connect_signal (hal_proxy, "Condition",
00254         G_CALLBACK (signal_handler_Condition), NULL, NULL);
00255 
00256     /* allocate and add to array */
00257     udiproxy = g_new0 (UdiProxy, 1);
00258     strncpy (udiproxy->udi, udi, 128);
00259     udiproxy->proxy = hal_proxy;
00260     g_ptr_array_add (proxy.device_condition, (gpointer) udiproxy);
00261 
00262     return TRUE;
00263 }

00270 gboolean
00271 glibhal_watch_add_device_property_modified (const gchar *udi)
00272 {
00273     DBusGConnection *system_connection;
00274     DBusGProxy *hal_proxy = NULL;
00275     GType struct_array_type;
00276     GError *error = NULL;
00277     int a;
00278     UdiProxy *udiproxy;
00279 
00280     /* assertion checks */
00281     g_assert (udi);
00282 
00283     /* need to check for previous add */
00284     for (a=0;a < proxy.device_property_modified->len;a++) {
00285         udiproxy = g_ptr_array_index (proxy.device_property_modified, a);
00286         if (strcmp (udi, udiproxy->udi) == 0) {
00287             g_warning ("glibhal: PropertyModified: Already registered UDI '%s'!", udi);
00288             return FALSE;
00289         }
00290     }
00291     g_debug ("glibhal: PropertyModified: Registered UDI '%s'", udi);
00292     if (!dbus_get_system_connection (&system_connection))
00293         return FALSE;
00294     hal_proxy = dbus_g_proxy_new_for_name_owner  (system_connection,
00295         "org.freedesktop.Hal",
00296         udi,
00297         "org.freedesktop.Hal.Device", &error);
00298 
00299     struct_array_type = dbus_g_type_get_collection ("GPtrArray", G_TYPE_VALUE_ARRAY);
00300     dbus_g_object_register_marshaller (gpm_marshal_VOID__INT_BOXED,
00301         G_TYPE_NONE, G_TYPE_INT, struct_array_type, G_TYPE_INVALID);
00302     dbus_g_proxy_add_signal (hal_proxy, "PropertyModified",
00303         G_TYPE_INT, struct_array_type, G_TYPE_INVALID);
00304     dbus_g_proxy_connect_signal (hal_proxy, "PropertyModified",
00305         G_CALLBACK (signal_handler_PropertyModified), NULL, NULL);
00306 
00307     /* allocate and add to array */
00308     udiproxy = g_new0 (UdiProxy, 1);
00309     strncpy (udiproxy->udi, udi, 128);
00310     udiproxy->proxy = hal_proxy;
00311     g_ptr_array_add (proxy.device_property_modified, (gpointer) udiproxy);
00312 
00313     return TRUE;
00314 }

00320 gboolean
00321 glibhal_watch_remove_device_removed (void)
00322 {
00323     if (!proxy.device_removed) {
00324         g_warning ("glibhal: glibhal_watch_remove_removed when no watch!");
00325         return FALSE;
00326     }
00327     g_debug ("glibhal: watch remove removed");
00328     g_object_unref (G_OBJECT (proxy.device_removed));
00329     proxy.device_removed = NULL;
00330     return TRUE;
00331 }

00345     g_object_unref (G_OBJECT (proxy.device_added));
00346     proxy.device_added = NULL;
00347     return TRUE;

00389 gboolean
00390 glibhal_watch_remove_device_property_modified (const gchar *udi)
00391 {
00392     int a;
00393 
00394     /* assertion checks */
00395     g_assert (udi);
00396 
00397     UdiProxy *udiproxy = NULL;
00398     for (a=0;a < proxy.device_property_modified->len;a++) {
00399         udiproxy = g_ptr_array_index (proxy.device_property_modified, a);
00400         if (strcmp (udi, udiproxy->udi) == 0)
00401             break;
00402     }
00403     if (a == proxy.device_property_modified->len || !udiproxy) {
00404         g_warning ("glibhal: glibhal_watch_remove_property_modified when no watch on '%s'!", udi);
00405         return FALSE;
00406     }
00407 
00408     g_debug ("glibhal: watch remove property_modified on '%s'", udi);
00409     g_object_unref (G_OBJECT (udiproxy->proxy));
00410     g_ptr_array_remove_fast (proxy.device_property_modified, (gpointer) udiproxy);
00411     g_free (udiproxy);
00412 
00413     return TRUE;
00414 }

00421 gboolean
00422 glibhal_watch_remove_device_condition (const gchar *udi)
00423 {
00424     int a;
00425 
00426     /* assertion checks */
00427     g_assert (udi);
00428 
00429     UdiProxy *udiproxy = NULL;
00430     for (a=0;a < proxy.device_condition->len;a++) {
00431         udiproxy = g_ptr_array_index (proxy.device_condition, a);
00432         if (strcmp (udi, udiproxy->udi) == 0)
00433             break;
00434     }
00435     if (a == proxy.device_condition->len || !udiproxy) {
00436         g_warning ("glibhal: glibhal_watch_remove_condition when no watch on '%s'!", udi);
00437         return FALSE;
00438     }
00439 
00440     g_debug ("glibhal: watch remove condition on '%s'", udi);
00441     g_object_unref (G_OBJECT (udiproxy->proxy));
00442     g_ptr_array_remove_fast (proxy.device_condition, (gpointer) udiproxy);
00443     g_free (udiproxy);
00444 
00445     return TRUE;
00446 }

00452 gboolean
00453 glibhal_method_device_removed (HalDeviceRemoved callback)
00454 {
00455     /* assertion checks */
00456     g_assert (callback);
00457 
00458     if (!reg.device_removed)
00459         glibhal_watch_add_device_removed ();
00460     function.device_removed = callback;
00461     return TRUE;
00462 }

00542 gboolean
00543 glibhal_callback_init (void)
00544 {
00545     g_debug ("glibhal_callback: init");
00546     function.device_added = NULL;
00547     function.device_removed = NULL;
00548     function.device_new_capability = NULL;
00549     function.device_lost_capability = NULL;
00550     function.device_property_modified = NULL;
00551     function.device_condition = NULL;
00552 
00553     reg.device_added = FALSE;
00554     reg.device_removed = FALSE;
00555     reg.device_new_capability = FALSE;
00556     reg.device_lost_capability = FALSE;
00557     reg.device_condition = FALSE;
00558 
00559     proxy.device_added = NULL;
00560     proxy.device_removed = NULL;
00561     proxy.device_new_capability = NULL;
00562     proxy.device_lost_capability = NULL;
00563     /* array types */
00564     proxy.device_condition = g_ptr_array_new ();
00565     proxy.device_property_modified = g_ptr_array_new ();
00566 
00567     return TRUE;
00568 }
00569 
00574 gboolean
00575 glibhal_callback_shutdown (void)
00576 {
00577     int a;
00578     UdiProxy *udiproxy;
00579 
00580     g_debug ("glibhal: shutdown");
00581     if (proxy.device_added)
00582         glibhal_watch_remove_device_added ();
00583     if (proxy.device_removed)
00584         glibhal_watch_remove_device_removed ();
00585     if (proxy.device_new_capability)
00586         glibhal_watch_remove_device_new_capability ();
00587     if (proxy.device_lost_capability)
00588         glibhal_watch_remove_device_lost_capability ();
00589 
00590     /* array types */
00591     for (a=0;a < proxy.device_condition->len;a++) {
00592         udiproxy = g_ptr_array_index (proxy.device_condition, a);
00593         glibhal_watch_remove_device_condition (udiproxy->udi);
00594     }
00595     for (a=0;a < proxy.device_property_modified->len;a++) {
00596         udiproxy = g_ptr_array_index (proxy.device_property_modified, a);
00597         glibhal_watch_remove_device_property_modified (udiproxy->udi);
00598     }
00599     g_ptr_array_free (proxy.device_condition, TRUE);
00600     g_ptr_array_free (proxy.device_property_modified, TRUE);
00601 
00602     return TRUE;
00603 }
